1.content: It was one sunny afternoon and john was waking up from a dream he had. In the dream he met a naga with red hair white skin and a white ribbon. John said who was that girl? Hmm I guess I have to dream some more to find out. I guess I will go exploring today I need to get my flashlight. He got his flashlight and ran down stairs and out the door into the woods as he was walking in the woods it started to get dark and it rained. He saw a cave and ran into it to stay dry. John said hmmm doesn’t look like any bears or bats live in here. I’m going to go deeper so right after he said that rock slide happened and blocked the cave entrance so he was trapped. John said well I guess I can’t turn back now ok let’s go. He turns his flashlight on and went deeper into the cave as he went further in the cave he saw a giant hole with a pink glow in it. John said so what do I do jump in or stay and go deeper?
1.title: The Beginning

112.content:
"Sorry, but I must refuse!" You said, the lamia's face falling a bit, your reasons being that you don't know that well and she could be a criminal for all you know.
"Okay, but it's not exactly safe here, so maybe if you're with me, you'll be safer," she said, clearly worried but you motion to her you'll be fine.
Walking around the area, you realize you're in a jungle and looking around, you can see things that you know that's definitely not in your world, both flora and fauna. The naga kept an eye on you and continued to follow you for a while, due to her unsettling concern for you. After about an hour of exploring, you decide to take a break and lay on a flat boulder nearby.
"If you're hungry, I can grab some berries nearby and make some tea while I'm at it," she said, you waving your hand in approval and she soon disappears into the shrubs.
Taking a nap, you wake up about thirty minutes later and stretch, noting that the snake girl isn't here yet before the trees part behind you. Being over at least 60 ft tall, was another snake girl, a blue haired fair girl with it reaching her mid-back and two tufts of white hair coming behind her ears, as if they were wings. Despite having large breast (even for her size), her main attraction was her wide hips that connected her human and viridian snake bodies together, being wider than a large fancy leather chair. Her brown eyes weren't looking at him, much to your relief, but she faces the same direction you're facing and you're in awe of the sight before you. Each of her cheeks were bigger than an extra large exercise ball and as if someone spray painted the scales on while she was wearing panties before she took off the panties, that was the scene before you. Though the view was nice for a teenager like yourself, you soon notice her butt was coming closer and before you can escape, her ass compresses you into her crack. Her ass spilled over boulder and because of the amount booty fat, you couldn't move an inch.

Kree was sitting on the boulder, minding her business, as she wanted to take a 'walk' outside, though her stomach has been grumbling a lot. Rubbing her gut, she felt something shift inside and before she knew it, she farted. Though some gas came out of her tail hole, the majority of it came from her bum and she felt a brief relief, however more flatulence was coming. Leaning to one side, she pushed out another fart, stronger than the last, and eventually, she smells her creation.
"Wow, that stinks, but that feels so good. Let's see if I can push some more out," she thought to herself, as she strains to remove her gas from the inside, resulting in a massive fart being heard all round the area.
Giggling, Kree gets up and returns home as she continue to pass gas in small bursts.

Meanwhile, you were in hell, as you were blasted by her ass winds. You struggled as the temperature rose and you slid further in until you reached her asshole, the rosebud, gaping open and close as the lamia pushed out farts. Pounding on the anus, you hope that your pleads of help will get to the giantess and she gets up, her buns sealing you within, much to your hope of her realizing she's aware of you. However she only gets up to slither home and you continue to garner her attention despite he flatulence. Does it work eventually?
112.title: The new world

1121.content:
Feeling something in her butt, Kree stops and holds in her gas as she searches for the disturbance. Unable to find to it, she spreads her cheeks a bit and places her hand over her crack before releasing her flatulence in a very powerful burst. Relieved from her flatulence, Kree grabs the thing that landed in her hand and brings it to her face.
"Whoa! That stinks!" She said, pinching her nose as she takes a whiff of her creation before opening her fist up.

That last fart shot John out of the lamia's ass and into something else. Disoriented, John could feel him move before coming to a stop and hears someone talking, though the ringing in his ears won't stop. As he slowly regains himself as light comes into his world and he's soon face-to-face with the giant naga from before.
"What the..." She says, a bit for John, who cowers with his hands over his ears and looks back at her face as it shows...
1121.title: Salvation?
